channel.title: Help with TELEPORTS [SOLVED]
channel.description:
I want to change catherby teleport, to a teleport where you can choose between like 5 options, like minigame/monster teleports.
I'm really stuck, I can changes the names etc, only... How do I change the coords? At a 1 option teleport its easy, but im stuck for like 1-2 weeks on this...
I'm using DeltaScape base [317], Clickingmost.Java.

item.title: Help with TELEPORTS [SOLVED]
item.dc:creator: @Menno582 Menno582
item.description:
@Menno582 wrote:

Ok tahnks everyone worked,

Read full topic

item.title: Help with TELEPORTS [SOLVED]
item.dc:creator: @djspanke djspanke
item.description:
@djspanke wrote:

 catherby <- search it

case 50245: // catherby teleport c.teleEffect = 1; c.sendQuest("Which monster?", 2470); c.sendQuest("monster 1", 2471); c.sendQuest("monster 2", 2472); c.sendQuest("monster 3", 2473); c.sendFrame164(2469); break;

Read full topic

item.title: Help with TELEPORTS [SOLVED]
item.dc:creator: @Menno582 Menno582
item.description:
@Menno582 wrote:

Hmm, but I see then at Lumbridge:

		case 50245: // lumbridge teleport 
			c.triggerTele(3222, 3218, 0);
			break;

It cant find anything else with 3222, and I want 5 options
^Nevermind^

[quote=“alancarr123, post:2, topic:269736”]I had the same problem now i’ve figured it.
teleport to the place that you want to change then type ::mypos.
search the first bit of the coord in ClickingMost.java and change it to whatever you want
BTW For the names its texthandler.java[/quote]

Wait now I see this:

		case 73100:
		case 4140:
		case 50235: // varrock teleport
			c.triggerTele(3212+misc.random(3), 3423+misc.random(3), 0);
		break;

What I must add to it to make it 5 options?
(Ty)

^Nevermind^

Read full topic

item.title: Help with TELEPORTS [SOLVED]
item.dc:creator: @Mellor Mellor
item.description:
@Mellor wrote:

You chagne the whole coord, to the new one . He says search the first part, so that you can find the coord in the first place.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with TELEPORTS [SOLVED]
item.dc:creator: @Menno582 Menno582
item.description:
@Menno582 wrote:

[quote=“alancarr123, post:2, topic:269736”]I had the same problem now i’ve figured it.
teleport to the place that you want to change then type ::mypos.
search the first bit of the coord in ClickingMost.java and change it to whatever you want
BTW For the names its texthandler.java[/quote]

Thank you very much, only…
How my source know the second coord?

Read full topic

item.title: Help with TELEPORTS [SOLVED]
item.dc:creator: @alancarr123 alancarr123
item.description:
@alancarr123 wrote:

I had the same problem now i’ve figured it.
teleport to the place that you want to change then type ::mypos.
search the first bit of the coord in ClickingMost.java and change it to whatever you want
BTW For the names its texthandler.java

Read full topic
